
snap(-12,-12,27)

sky(235,244,255)
fog(218,225,240)
ground(200,217,216)
polys(199,212,214)

fadefrom(5000)
density(5)

name(The Garden of the King)
nlaps(9)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(26,0,11200,0)pr
set(10,0,16800,0)p
set(30,0,20880,180)p
set(10,0,26989,0)p
set(10,0,32589,180)

set(10,-25900,-5600,0)p

set(10,0,-5600,0)

set(24,-6000,-2800,180)

set(15,-12950,5600,0)p

set(15,-12950,16800,180)
set(35,-12950,16410,0)
set(15,-12950,22400,0)
set(16,-12950,28000,0)
